about_the_game:
2064
The world is engulfed in mutated flora, eager to entirely annihilate fauna and reclaim its dominion. The surviving humans have divided into two camps - those who submit to nature and those who resist it. In these conditions, a group of surviving scientists creates a new weapon, but one day it escapes the laboratory and encounters one of the surviving individuals who has lost all purpose in existence.

GALDAN:

  • Uses melee and ranged weapons
  • Can interact with the world
  • A survivor whose attitudes are still worth comprehending for the player

CEDR:

  • Uses and subordinates nature
  • It can interact with plants
  • Someone who has a rare opportunity to help people



  • Solve problems and get to know the history
  • Find out how people survived in such conditions and use their knowledge
  • Do everything to save or destroy the world

It's up to you to decide how the story of the heroes turns out

content_descriptors.notes: There are scenes of violence against plants and fictional creatures

short_description: A single-player/multiplayer adventure game with survival elements set in a post-apocalyptic world, featuring a top-down perspective on reluctant travelers with their own objectives. Galdan's goal is to bring the girl to a "home," while Ceder aims to change the world for better or worse.
